description.p: digiKam is an advanced digital photo management application, which makes importing and organizing digital photos a "snap". The photos are organized in albums which can be sorted chronologically, by folder layout or by custom collections.

ul.li: Organization of photos in albums and sub-albums (with tags and comments support)
Support for Exif, Iptc, Xmp, Makernotes
SQLite powered storage for the albums and its metadata
Support for filtering and sorting albums
Import from more than 1100 digital camera devices
Share your photos using HTML or publishing them to social web sites
Image editor included with advanced features
